content.raw:
Isn’t `maybe_gzip_open()` used in Segway as well?

Also I keep seeing `str.encode()` called in this patch and it seems like some of this stuff should just be read in as bytes. I’m especially thinking of

    seq_array = frombuffer(seq.encode(GENOMEDATA_ENCODING), SEQ_DTYPE)

Before this we have:

1. read a huge sequence into memory, with unnecessary utf-8 decoding

This line:

1. encodes the sequence into latin-1 making a copy of it in memory
2. makes another copy into a NumPy array

I’m also concerned by the input and output encoding being different which may lead to problems with round trips.
